step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with your fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally to shoulder height. Make sure to exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Good work on opening your fingers and extending your arms. Focus on a full exhale and relaxing your muscles as you reach out.
You're doing well with the outward arm movement. Try to keep your wrists straighter as you extend your arms to shoulder height.
Nice extension! Ensure you're fully relaxing your muscles and exhaling completely as your arms reach out.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the horizontal pumping exercise. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles when your fists are closed, then exhale and relax as you extend your arms. Keep those movements smooth and controlled.
